trans-unit.source: Serves as the root class of the Chart control.
trans-unit.target: 做為根類別，Chart 控制項。

trans-unit.source: This class exposes all of the properties, methods and events of the Chart Web control.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別會公開的所有屬性、 方法和事件的圖表 Web 控制項。

trans-unit.source: Two important properties of the Chart class are the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.Series%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.ChartAreas%2A> properties, both of which are collection properties.
trans-unit.target: 圖表類別的兩個重要屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.Series%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.ChartAreas%2A>屬性，兩者都是集合屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.ChartAreas%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.Series%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.Series%2A> collection property stores <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Series> objects, which are used to store data that is to be displayed, along with attributes of that data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.Series%2A>集合屬性儲存區<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Series>物件，用來儲存資料所要顯示，以及該資料的屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Series> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.Series%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.ChartAreas%2A> collection property stores <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea> objects, which are primarily used to draw one or more charts using one set of axes.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.ChartAreas%2A>集合屬性儲存區<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea>主要用來繪製使用一組軸的一或多個圖表的物件。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.ChartAreas%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: You can use this constructor to create a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> class at run time.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這個建構函式建立的新執行個體<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>在執行階段類別。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>

trans-unit.source: However, for simplicity, it is recommended that you create a <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> instance at design time.
trans-unit.target: 不過，為了簡單起見，建議您建立<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>在設計階段的執行個體。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>

trans-unit.source: This is the root object of the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> control.
trans-unit.target: 這是根物件的<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>

trans-unit.source: Aligns data points along the X axis using their axis labels.
trans-unit.target: 對齊沿著 X 軸，使用其軸標籤的資料點。

trans-unit.source: Applicable when multiple series are indexed and their X-values are strings.
trans-unit.target: 當多個數列會編製索引，而且其 X 值的字串時適用。

trans-unit.source: Aligns data points from different series along the X axis using their axis labels.
trans-unit.target: 對齊資料點，從不同的序列，沿著 X 軸，使用其軸標籤。

trans-unit.source: The specified series in the chart are aligned using an ascending sort order.
trans-unit.target: 指定之數列在圖表中的會使用遞增排序次序來對齊。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to align data points from different series along the X axis using their axis labels, and is applicable when: - Multiple series are displayed and are indexed; that is, all data points have an <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPoint.XValue%2A> of 0, or the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Series.IsXValueIndexed%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法用來將不同的序列，沿著 X 軸，使用其軸標籤，從資料點對齊和時，適用︰ 為多個數列會顯示，而且會編製索引;也就是說，所有資料點都有<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPoint.XValue%2A>為 0，或<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Series.IsXValueIndexed%2A>屬性是`true`。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Series.IsXValueIndexed%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPoint.XValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: - All data points have non-empty axis labels, which are unique to their <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Series>.
trans-unit.target: -所有的資料點有更至其<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Series>。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Series>唯一的非空白軸標籤

trans-unit.source: If they are not unique, an exception will be thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果它們不是唯一的就會擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: This situation is very common when data-binding results in the creation of multiple series, and `string` values are used for X-axis values.
trans-unit.target: 這種情況是非常普遍，當資料繫結結果會在多個數列，建立和`string`值會用於 x 軸值。

trans-unit.source: Two issues arise when multiple, indexed series are plotted, and the X-values are set using `string` values: - It cannot be guaranteed that data points from different series with the same string X-values will be plotted at the same index along the X axis.
trans-unit.target: 多個索引時，會引發兩個問題會繪製數列，並使用設定 X 值`string`值:-無法保證不同數列使用相同的 X 值字串中的資料點將會繪製在 X 軸相同的索引。

trans-unit.source: - Only the axis label for the data points in the first series will be displayed, even though data points from other series with the same index have axis labels too.
trans-unit.target: -僅限第一個數列中的資料點軸標籤將會顯示，即使其他數列具有相同索引中的資料點軸標籤太。

trans-unit.source: By default, points are plotted in the order in which they are stored in their series.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，點繪製其數列中儲存的順序。

trans-unit.source: To specify a sort order, use an `AlignDataPointsByAxisLabel` method overload that has a `sortingOrder` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定排序次序，請使用`AlignDataPointsByAxisLabel`具有方法多載`sortingOrder`參數。

trans-unit.source: A comma-separated list of series that will have their data points aligned to the X axis using the data point axis labels.
trans-unit.target: 序列，會將其對齊 X 軸，使用資料點軸標籤的資料點的以逗號分隔清單。

trans-unit.source: Aligns data points using their axis labels.
trans-unit.target: 對齊使用其軸標籤的資料點。

trans-unit.source: All series in the chart are aligned, using the specified sort order.
trans-unit.target: 圖表中的所有數列都對齊時，使用指定的排序順序。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.PointSortOrder"></xref> object that indicates if ascending or descending sort order is used on axis labels, which in turn determines the order by which points that previously occupied the same axis space are displayed.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.PointSortOrder"> </xref>物件指出軸標籤是否使用遞增或遞減排序次序又決定依據先前所佔用的相同軸空間會顯示的順序。

trans-unit.source: Aligns data points using their axis labels.
trans-unit.target: 對齊使用其軸標籤的資料點。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to align data points from different series along the X axis using their axis labels, and is applicable when: - Multiple series are displayed and are indexed; that is, all data points have an <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPoint.XValue%2A> of 0, or the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Series.IsXValueIndexed%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法用來將不同的序列，沿著 X 軸，使用其軸標籤，從資料點對齊和時，適用︰ 為多個數列會顯示，而且會編製索引;也就是說，所有資料點都有<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPoint.XValue%2A>為 0，或<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Series.IsXValueIndexed%2A>屬性是`true`。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Series.IsXValueIndexed%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPoint.XValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: - All data points have non-empty axis labels, which are unique to their <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Series>.
trans-unit.target: -所有的資料點有更至其<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Series>。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Series>唯一的非空白軸標籤

trans-unit.source: If they are not unique, an exception will be thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果它們不是唯一的就會擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: This situation is very common when data-binding results in the creation of multiple series, and `string` values are used for X-axis values.
trans-unit.target: 這種情況是非常普遍，當資料繫結結果會在多個數列，建立和`string`值會用於 x 軸值。

trans-unit.source: Two issues arise when multiple, indexed series are plotted, and the X-values are set using `string` values: - It cannot be guaranteed that data points from different series with the same string X-values will be plotted at the same index along the X axis.
trans-unit.target: 多個索引時，會引發兩個問題會繪製數列，並使用設定 X 值`string`值:-無法保證不同數列使用相同的 X 值字串中的資料點將會繪製在 X 軸相同的索引。

trans-unit.source: - Only the axis label for the data points in the first series will be displayed, even though data points from other series with the same index have axis labels too.
trans-unit.target: -僅限第一個數列中的資料點軸標籤將會顯示，即使其他數列具有相同索引中的資料點軸標籤太。

trans-unit.source: By default, points are plotted in the order in which they are stored in their series.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，點繪製其數列中儲存的順序。

trans-unit.source: To specify a sort order, use an `AlignDataPointsByAxisLabel` method overload that has a `sortingOrder` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定排序次序，請使用`AlignDataPointsByAxisLabel`具有方法多載`sortingOrder`參數。

trans-unit.source: A comma-separated list of series that should be aligned by axis label.
trans-unit.target: 應該依軸標籤對齊的系列的逗號分隔清單。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.PointSortOrder"></xref> enumeration value that determines if ascending or descending sort order is used on axis labels, which in turn determines the order by which points that previously occupied the same axis space are displayed.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.PointSortOrder"> </xref>列舉值，決定如果遞增或遞減排序次序適用於軸標籤，接著決定先前所佔用的相同軸空間的點顯示的順序。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the alternate text displayed in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart"></xref> control when the chart image is unavailable.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定中顯示的替代文字<xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart"></xref>控制圖表影像無法使用。

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> value that represents the alternate text displayed in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart"></xref> control when the chart image is unavailable.
trans-unit.target: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""> </xref>值，表示在顯示的替代文字<xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart"></xref>控制圖表影像無法使用。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.AnnotationCollection"></xref> object that is used to store chart annotations.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定<xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.AnnotationCollection"></xref>物件，用來儲存圖表註解。

trans-unit.source: All of the chart annotations are stored in this collection property.
trans-unit.target: 所有圖表註解會儲存在這個集合屬性。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.AnnotationCollection"></xref> object that is used to store chart annotations.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.AnnotationCollection"> </xref>物件，用來儲存圖表註解。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that determines whether anti-aliasing is used when text and graphics are drawn.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，這個值會決定當繪製文字和圖形時，是否使用消除鋸齒。

trans-unit.source: Anti-aliasing smoothens out "jagged edges" by padding pixels with intermediate colors, and is especially effective for smoothing out edges for charts that are not drawn as rectangles.
trans-unit.target: 消除鋸齒 smoothens 出 「 鋸齒狀邊緣 」 填補與中繼的色彩的像素為單位，就不會繪製矩形的圖表的邊緣變平滑特別有效。

trans-unit.source: For example, anti-aliasing is very effective for line charts and pie charts, but is not as effective for bar and column charts.
trans-unit.target: 比方說，消除鋸齒折線圖和圓形圖，非常有效，但不是有效的橫條和直條圖。

trans-unit.source: Anti-aliasing can be applied to text and/or graphics primitives such as rectangles, circles, and so forth.
trans-unit.target: 消除鋸齒可以套用至文字及/或圖形的基本型別，例如矩形、 圓形和其他等等。

trans-unit.source: Note that anti-aliasing will affect performance.
trans-unit.target: 請注意該消除鋸齒會影響效能。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.AntiAliasingStyles"></xref> enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.AntiAliasingStyles"> </xref>列舉值。

trans-unit.source: Sets the automatically assigned series and data point colors, to allow programmatic access at run time.
trans-unit.target: 設定自動指派的數列和資料點的色彩，以便在執行階段以程式設計方式存取。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> colors are automatically assigned at run time, there is no way to know what the colors will be prior to the time when the chart rendered; the `Color` property of an automatically assigned value will return <xref:System.Drawing.Color.Empty> at this time.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>色彩會自動指派給執行階段、 沒有方法知道色彩將會呈現圖表時，時間之前，先`Color`自動指派值的屬性會傳回<xref:System.Drawing.Color.Empty>此時。</xref:System.Drawing.Color.Empty> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>

trans-unit.source: If you call the ApplyPaletteColors method, the colors for the series and the data points will be set, which allows for programmatic access.
trans-unit.target: 如果您呼叫 ApplyPaletteColors 方法，將不設定數列和資料點的色彩，這可讓您以程式設計方式存取。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the background color of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定背景色彩<xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: You can set this property to any valid ARGB (alpha, red, green, blue) value.
trans-unit.target: 您可以為任何有效的 ARGB （alpha、 紅、 綠、 藍色） 值設定這個屬性。

trans-unit.source: Note that for the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> object, the alpha component cannot be set to a value other than 255.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，針對<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>物件時，無法設定 alpha 元件為 255 以外的值。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>

trans-unit.source: This also means that, for the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> object only, a <xref:System.Drawing.Color.Transparent%2A> value cannot be used.
trans-unit.target: 這也表示，如<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>僅物件，<xref:System.Drawing.Color.Transparent%2A>值不能使用。</xref:System.Drawing.Color.Transparent%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>

trans-unit.source: The BackColor value will be the first color used if you are using gradient colors for the background.
trans-unit.target: 背景色彩值會是如果您要用於背景漸層色彩使用的第一個色彩。

trans-unit.source: The alpha value controls the opacity of a color.
trans-unit.target: Alpha 值會控制色彩的不透明度。

trans-unit.source: If you set this color to "transparent"—that is, if you use an alpha value of 0—no color will be assigned to the background of the title.
trans-unit.target: 如果您設定此色彩為"透明"— 也就是如果您使用 0 的 alpha 值-無色彩會指派給標題的背景。

trans-unit.source: As a result, the background will be transparent.
trans-unit.target: 如此一來，背景會變成透明。

trans-unit.source: The following table represents the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Series> types that support gradients: |Series Types|2D|3D| |------------------|--------|--------| |Bar|X|-| |Box Plot|X|X| |Bubble|-|-| |Candle Stick|X|X| |Column|X|X| |Doughnut|X|-| |Error Bar|-|-| |Fast Line|-|-| |Fast Point|-|-| |Funnel|X|X| |Gantt|X|-| |Kagi|-|-| |Line|-|-| |Pie|X|-| |Point|-|-| |Point and Figure|X|-| |Polar|-|-| |Pyramid|X|X| |Radar|X|X| |Range Column|X|-| |Renko|X|-| |Spline|-|-| |Spline Area Area|X|-| |Spline Range|X|-| |Stacked Area|X|-| |Stacked Area 100|X|-| |Stacked Bar|X|-| |Stacked Bar 100|X|-| |Stacked Column|X|-| |Stacked Column 100|X|-| |Step Line|-|-| |Stock|-|-| |Three Line Break|X|-|
trans-unit.target: 下表代表<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Series>類型，可支援漸層: |序列類型 | 2D | 3D | |------------------|--------|--------| |列 |X |-| |方塊繪圖 |X |X | |泡泡 |-|-| |K 搖桿 |X |X | |資料行 |X |X | |環圈圖 |X |-| |誤差線 |-|-| |快速列 |-|-| |快速點 |-|-| |漏斗圖 |X |X | |甘特圖 |X |-| |Kagi |-|-| |行 |-|-| |圓形圖 |X |-| |點 |-|-| |點數圖 |X |-| |極座標圖 |-|-| |金字塔圖 |X |X | |雷達圖 |X |X | |資料行的範圍 |X |-| |磚形圖 |X |-| |曲線 |-|-| |曲線區域區域 |X |-| |曲線範圍圖 |X |-| |堆疊區域圖 |X |-| |堆疊區域 100 |X |-| |堆疊橫條圖 |X |-| |堆疊橫條 100 |X |-| |堆疊直條圖 |X |-| |堆疊 100 直條圖 |X |-| |逐步執行一行 |-|-| |股票 |-|-| |三個換行 |X|-|</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Series>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value that represents the background color of the chart object.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref>值，表示圖表物件的背景色彩。

trans-unit.source: The default color is [System.Drawing.Color.White](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 預設色彩是[System.Drawing.Color.White](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the orientation for the background gradient of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定背景漸層的方向<xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Also determines whether a gradient is used.
trans-unit.target: 也會決定是否要使用的漸層。

trans-unit.source: Use the BackGradientStyle property to determine whether a <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> control will display a gradient, and to determine the orientation of the gradient if one is used.
trans-unit.target: 使用 BackGradientStyle 屬性來判斷是否<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>控制項會顯示漸層和用來判斷一個漸層的方向。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>

trans-unit.source: For a listing of available patterns, refer to the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.GradientStyle> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 如需可用的模式的清單，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.GradientStyle>列舉型別。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.GradientStyle>

trans-unit.source: To use gradient colors: Set the primary color of the chart background with the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.BackColor%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用漸層色彩︰ 設定圖表背景使用的主要色彩<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.BackColor%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.BackColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: Set the secondary color of the chart background with the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.BackSecondaryColor%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 設定圖表背景使用的次要色彩<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.BackSecondaryColor%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.BackSecondaryColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: Set this BackGradientStyle property to the desired gradient style.
trans-unit.target: 這個 BackGradientStyle 屬性設為所需的漸層樣式。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.GradientStyle"></xref> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.GradientStyle"> </xref>列舉型別。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.GradientStyle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.GradientStyle"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the hatching style of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定影線樣式<xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartHatchStyle> enumeration specifies the hatch pattern used by a brush of type <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchBrush>.
trans-unit.target: 的<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartHatchStyle>列舉值會指定使用的型別<xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchBrush>.</xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchBrush>筆刷規劃圖樣</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartHatchStyle>

trans-unit.source: The hatch pattern consists of a solid background color and lines drawn over the background.
trans-unit.target: 規劃圖樣包含透明的背景色彩和背景上繪製的直線。

trans-unit.source: For a listing of available hatching styles, refer to the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartHatchStyle> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 如需可用影線樣式的清單，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartHatchStyle>列舉型別。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartHatchStyle>

trans-unit.source: **Note** The color of hatching lines is determined by the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.BackSecondaryColor%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: **請注意**影線線條的色彩由<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.BackSecondaryColor%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.BackSecondaryColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartHatchStyle"></xref> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartHatchStyle"> </xref>列舉型別。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartHatchStyle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartHatchStyle"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the background image of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定背景影像的<xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: This property defines a path to a background image for a <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> legend, and can be an absolute or relative URL.
trans-unit.target: 此屬性定義的背景影像路徑<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>圖例中，而且可以是絕對或相對的 URL。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>

trans-unit.source: To position the image, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.BackImageAlignment%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.BackImageWrapMode%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 若要設定影像位置，使用<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.BackImageAlignment%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.BackImageWrapMode%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.BackImageWrapMode%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.BackImageAlignment%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also specify one of the colors displayed by the image as "transparent", by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.BackImageTransparentColor%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以指定其中一個設定為"透明 」 映像所顯示的色彩<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.BackImageTransparentColor%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.BackImageTransparentColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: An image can originate from any valid graphics file supported by .NET Framework, including icons.
trans-unit.target: 映像可能源自任何支援的.NET Framework 中，包括圖示的有效圖形檔。

trans-unit.source: Background images take precedence over other background properties such as gradient color.
trans-unit.target: 背景影像的優先順序高於其他背景屬性，例如漸層色彩。

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> value that represents the URL of an image file.
trans-unit.target: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""> </xref>值，表示影像檔案的 URL。

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty string.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為空字串。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the background image alignment used for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageWrapMode"></xref> drawing mode.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定用於背景影像對齊<xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageWrapMode"></xref>繪圖模式。

trans-unit.source: This property determines the alignment of the background image for the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> control; it is only applied when the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.BackImageWrapMode%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageWrapMode>.
trans-unit.target: 此屬性決定的背景影像的對齊方式<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>控制項; 它僅適用於當<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.BackImageWrapMode%2A>屬性設定為<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageWrapMode>.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageWrapMode> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.BackImageWrapMode%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageAlignmentStyle"></xref> enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageAlignmentStyle"> </xref>列舉值。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageAlignmentStyle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageAlignmentStyle"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the color of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart"></xref> control that will be displayed as transparent.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定色彩<xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart"></xref>將會顯示為透明的控制項。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value that will be displayed as transparent when the chart image is drawn.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref>時，會顯示透明繪製圖表影像的值。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the drawing mode for the background image of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定背景影像繪圖模式<xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: This property determines how the image is displayed, for example, tiled, scaled, and so forth.
trans-unit.target: 此屬性會決定影像顯示的方式，例如，並排顯示、 縮放，等等。

trans-unit.source: If an image is scaled, it will be stretched to fit within the bounds of the chart.
trans-unit.target: 如果縮放的影像，將會自動縮放以符合圖表的範圍內。

trans-unit.source: If the image is tiled, it is repeatedly drawn, starting from the top-left corner of the chart.
trans-unit.target: 如果影像會並排顯示，它會重複繪製，從圖表的左上角開始。

trans-unit.source: For more information about the available wrapping modes, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageWrapMode> enumeration topic.
trans-unit.target: 如需可用文繞圖模式的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageWrapMode>列舉主題。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageWrapMode>

trans-unit.source: If the BackImageWrapMode property is set to <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageWrapMode>, the location where the image is drawn is determined by the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.BackImageAlignment%2A> property setting.
trans-unit.target: 如果 BackImageWrapMode 屬性設定為<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageWrapMode>，其中繪製影像的位置由<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.BackImageAlignment%2A>屬性設定。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.BackImageAlignment%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageWrapMode>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageWrapMode"></xref> enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageWrapMode"> </xref>列舉值。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageWrapMode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageWrapMode"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the secondary color of the chart background.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定圖表背景次要色彩。

trans-unit.source: The BackSecondaryColor property determines the secondary background color of many <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> objects, and is used when gradient colors are being applied.
trans-unit.target: BackSecondaryColor 屬性會決定次要背景色彩，許多<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>物件，並套用漸層色彩時，才能使用。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>

trans-unit.source: You can set BackSecondaryColor to any valid ARGB (alpha, red, green, blue) value.
trans-unit.target: 您可以設定 BackSecondaryColor 任何有效的 ARGB （alpha、 紅、 綠、 藍色） 值。

trans-unit.source: If hatching is used, the BackSecondaryColor property determines the color of the hatching lines for the chart.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用影線，BackSecondaryColor 屬性會決定圖表影線線條的色彩。

trans-unit.source: To use gradient colors for the background of a chart: - Set the primary color with the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.BackColor%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用的圖表背景漸層色彩:-設定主要色彩與<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.BackColor%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.BackColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: - Set the secondary color with the BackSecondaryColor property.
trans-unit.target: -設定與 BackSecondaryColor 屬性的次要色彩。

trans-unit.source: - Set the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.BackGradientStyle%2A> property to the desired gradient style.
trans-unit.target: -設定<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.BackGradientStyle%2A>屬性所需的漸層樣式。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.BackGradientStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the color of the chart border.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定圖表框線的色彩。

trans-unit.source: To get or set the border color, use <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.BorderlineColor%2A> instead.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定框線色彩，請使用<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.BorderlineColor%2A>改用。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.BorderlineColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the color of the entire chart image border.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定整個圖表影像框線的色彩。

trans-unit.source: You can set this property to any valid ARGB value (alpha, red, green, blue value).
trans-unit.target: 任何有效的 ARGB 值 （alpha、 紅色、 綠色、 藍色值），您可以設定此屬性。

trans-unit.source: This property is similar to the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.BorderColor%2A> property, the only difference being that the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.BorderColor%2A> property is not available from the Properties Window at design time.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性是類似於<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.BorderColor%2A>屬性，唯一的差異在於，<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.BorderColor%2A>屬性不是可從 [屬性] 視窗在設計階段。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.BorderColor%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.BorderColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> that represents the color of the entire chart image border.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref>表示整個圖表影像框線的色彩。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the style of the entire chart image border line.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定整個圖表影像的框線線條樣式。

trans-unit.source: This property determines the line style used for the chart image border line.
trans-unit.target: 此屬性會決定用於圖表影像的框線線條的線條樣式。

trans-unit.source: The line can be solid, dotted, and so forth For further style options, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartDashStyle> enumeration topic.
trans-unit.target: 行可以是實線，點線、 和等進一步樣式選項，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartDashStyle>列舉主題。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartDashStyle>

trans-unit.source: This property is similar to the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.BorderStyle%2A> property, the only difference being that the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.BorderStyle%2A> property is not available from the Properties Window at design time.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性是類似於<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.BorderStyle%2A>屬性，唯一的差異在於，<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.BorderStyle%2A>屬性不是可從 [屬性] 視窗在設計階段。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.BorderStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.BorderStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartDashStyle"></xref> enumeration value that determines the border line style of the chart image.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartDashStyle"> </xref>列舉值，決定圖表影像的框線樣式。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the width of the border line for the entire chart image.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定整個圖表影像的框線線條的寬度。

trans-unit.source: An <xref uid="langword_csharp_integer" name="integer" href=""></xref> value that determines the width of the chart image border line, in pixels.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_integer" name="integer" href=""> </xref>決定的圖表影像框線線條，單位為像素寬度的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.BorderSkin"></xref> object, which provides border skin functionality for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定<xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.BorderSkin"></xref>物件，提供框線外觀功能<xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Use this property to specify a border skin for the chart.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這個屬性來指定圖表的框線外觀。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.BorderSkin"></xref> object which provides border skin functionality for the chart control.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.BorderSkin"> </xref>提供圖表控制項的框線外觀功能的物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the border style of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定的框線樣式<xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BorderStyle"></xref> of the chart.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BorderStyle"> </xref>的圖表。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the width of the chart border.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定圖表框線的寬度。

trans-unit.source: To get or set the border width, use <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.BorderlineWidth%2A> instead.
trans-unit.target: 若要取得或設定框線寬度，使用<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.BorderlineWidth%2A>改用。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.BorderlineWidth%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref uid="langword_csharp_integer" name="integer" href=""></xref> value that determines the border width, in pixels, of the chart.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_integer" name="integer" href=""> </xref>值，決定框線的寬度，以像素的圖表。

trans-unit.source: Gets the build number of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得組建編號<xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> that represents the build number.
trans-unit.target: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""> </xref>表示組建編號。

trans-unit.source: Gets a read-only <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartAreaCollection"></xref> object that is used to store <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: 取得唯讀<xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartAreaCollection"></xref>物件，用來儲存<xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: This collection property lets you access the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartAreaCollection> object, which stores <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea> objects and also provides methods and properties used to manipulate the collection.
trans-unit.target: 此集合屬性可讓您存取<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartAreaCollection>物件，其中儲存<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea>物件，也會提供方法和屬性可用來操作集合。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartAreaCollection>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea> objects are used to plot one or more charts.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea>物件可用來繪製一或多個圖表。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartAreaCollection"></xref> object that is used to store <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartAreaCollection"> </xref>物件，用來儲存<xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the active image map area defined by <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPoint.PostBackValue*> on the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart"></xref> control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 發生於所定義的作用中的影像對應區域<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPoint.PostBackValue*>上<xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart"></xref>按一下控制項時。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPoint.PostBackValue*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the amount of compression for the chart image.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定圖表影像的壓縮量。

trans-unit.source: Compression is expressed as a percentage; for example, to use 50% compression, set this property to 50.
trans-unit.target: 壓縮是以百分比表示。例如，若要使用 50%壓縮，這個屬性設定為 50。

trans-unit.source: Compression is used for all rendering methods, as determined by the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.RenderType%2A> property, but only for JPEG images, which are specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageType> enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: 壓縮會用於所有的轉譯方法，取決於<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.RenderType%2A>屬性，但是僅針對所指定的 JPEG 影像<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageType>列舉值。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageType> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.RenderType%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref uid="langword_csharp_integer" name="integer" href=""></xref> that represents the amount of compression for the entire chart image.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_integer" name="integer" href=""> </xref>表示整個圖表影像的壓縮量。

trans-unit.source: Gets the URL of the current image into which the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart"></xref> control will be rendered.
trans-unit.target: 取得目前影像的 URL，其中<xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart"></xref>會呈現控制項。

trans-unit.source: This property has no effect if <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.ImageStorageMode%2A> is set to <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.ImageStorageMode.UseHttpHandler%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個屬性就不會影響<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.ImageStorageMode%2A>設定為<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.ImageStorageMode.UseHttpHandler%2A>.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.ImageStorageMode.UseHttpHandler%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.ImageStorageMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> value that represents the URL of the current chart image.
trans-unit.target: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""> </xref>值，表示目前的圖表影像的 URL。

trans-unit.source: Occurs just before the chart image is drawn.
trans-unit.target: 繪製圖表影像之前發生。

trans-unit.source: All chart data is available and all chart properties have been set.
trans-unit.target: 圖表的所有資料，並已設定圖表的所有屬性。

trans-unit.source: This event has two unique features: - All chart data is available; that is, the series and their data points are populated.
trans-unit.target: 此事件有兩個唯一的功能:-所有圖表資料可供使用。也就是數列和其資料點會擴展。

trans-unit.source: This is especially useful if data-binding is being used, because the data can be examined and the chart can be adjusted just prior to being drawn.
trans-unit.target: 這是資料繫結正在使用，因為可檢查資料，而且可以調整圖表之前所繪製, 的特別有用。

trans-unit.source: - All chart properties have been set, including those properties that have been set to "Auto".
trans-unit.target: -所有圖表屬性已都設定，包括那些屬性已都設為 「 自動 」。

trans-unit.source: In other words, "Auto" properties now store the automatically calculated values, and can be examined and modified prior to the chart being drawn.
trans-unit.target: 換句話說，「 自動 」 屬性現在儲存自動計算的值，可檢查及修改之前所繪製的圖表。

trans-unit.source: Examples are the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.Minimum%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.Maximum%2A> properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis> class.
trans-unit.target: 範例包括<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.Minimum%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.Maximum%2A>屬性的<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis>類別。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.Maximum%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.Minimum%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use this event to modify or customize the chart image before it is drawn.
trans-unit.target: 若要修改或自訂圖表影像，它繪製前使用此事件。

trans-unit.source: When changes are made to a chart area, such as to the axis scale, the chart area properties must be recalculated in order to render the chart correctly.
trans-unit.target: 於圖表區域變更時，例如在軸標尺，圖表區域屬性必須重新計算才能正確地轉譯圖表。

trans-unit.source: To recalculate the chart, call the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.RecalculateAxesScale%2A> method after making modifications.
trans-unit.target: 若要重新計算圖表，請呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.RecalculateAxesScale%2A>方法之後進行修改。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.RecalculateAxesScale%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Occurs just before the chart legend is drawn.
trans-unit.target: 繪製圖表圖例之前發生。

trans-unit.source: Use this event to customize the chart legend items.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用此事件可自訂圖表圖例項目。

trans-unit.source: The CustomizeLegend event is primarily used to customize the legend just before it is drawn.
trans-unit.target: CustomizeLegend 事件主要用來繪製之前，自訂的圖例。

trans-unit.source: Both default and custom legend items can be removed or modified, and custom items can also be added.
trans-unit.target: 預設和自訂圖例項目可以移除或修改，也可以加入自訂項目。

trans-unit.source: In addition, the order of legend items can be changed.
trans-unit.target: 此外，您可以變更圖例項目的順序。

trans-unit.source: The chart image can also be modified before being drawn by using the sender argument.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以修改圖表影像前所使用的傳送者引數來繪製。

trans-unit.source: Note that a default legend item is an item that is created for either a data series or data point, but a custom legend item is not connected in any way to the chart data.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，預設的圖例項目是項目所建立的資料數列或資料點，但自訂圖例項目未連接到圖表資料的任何方式。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Occurs just before the chart image map is rendered.
trans-unit.target: 轉譯圖表影像對應前，就會發生。

trans-unit.source: Use this event to customize the map areas items.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用此事件可自訂對應區域項目。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CustomizeMapAreasEventArgs.MapAreaItems%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CustomizeMapAreasEventArgs> class can be used to: - Delete or modify map items that have automatically been created for a chart object; any data point, series, legend item or strip line object that has a non-empty `Url`, `MapAreaAttributes` or `ToolTip` property will have an associated map area object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CustomizeMapAreasEventArgs.MapAreaItems%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CustomizeMapAreasEventArgs>類別可以用來:-刪除或修改自動建立圖表物件; 任何資料點序列、 圖例項目或區域行 」 物件具有非空白的對應項目`Url`，`MapAreaAttributes`或`ToolTip`屬性會有相關聯的地圖區域物件。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CustomizeMapAreasEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CustomizeMapAreasEventArgs.MapAreaItems%2A>

trans-unit.source: - Add custom map areas that have a user-defined shape and coordinates.
trans-unit.target: 新增具有使用者定義的形狀和座標的自訂地圖區域。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The sender argument of type <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> is read-only.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 寄件者引數的型別<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>處於唯讀狀態。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Data binds a chart to the table, with one series created per unique value in a given column.
trans-unit.target: 資料繫結到資料表中，建立每個唯一值，指定資料行中的一個數列的圖表。

trans-unit.source: Series will be automatically added to the chart, depending on the number of unique values in the given `seriesGroupByField` column of the data source; in other words, the creation of series depends upon grouping of a column.
trans-unit.target: 數列將會自動加入至圖表，根據中唯一值數目指定`seriesGroupByField`資料行的資料來源; 亦即，數列建立相依於資料行群組。

trans-unit.source: The data source can be a <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataReader>, <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataReader> or a <xref:System.Data.DataView> object.
trans-unit.target: 資料來源可以是<xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataReader>，<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataReader>或<xref:System.Data.DataView>物件。</xref:System.Data.DataView> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataReader> </xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataReader>

trans-unit.source: Note that all collections that implement the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> interface can be used.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，所有集合，都實作<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>介面可用。</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>

trans-unit.source: Other data point properties besides X and Y-values can be bound.
trans-unit.target: 其他資料點屬性除了可以繫結的 X 和 Y 值。

trans-unit.source: The format is: PointProperty=Field[{Format}] [,PointProperty= Field[{Format}]].
trans-unit.target: 格式為︰ PointProperty = 欄位 {} [格式] [，PointProperty = 欄位 [{格式}]]。

trans-unit.source: For example:"Tooltip=Price{C1},Href=WebSiteName".
trans-unit.target: 例如: 「 工具提示 = 價格 {C1}，Href = WebSiteName"。

trans-unit.source: A list of these data point properties is as follows: <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPoint.AxisLabel%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPoint.ToolTip%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPoint.Url%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPoint.PostBackValue%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPoint.Label%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPoint.LegendText%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPoint.LegendToolTip%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPoint.CustomProperties%2A>, which are the names of the custom properties.
trans-unit.target: 這些資料點的屬性清單如下所示︰ <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPoint.AxisLabel%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPoint.ToolTip%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPoint.Url%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPoint.PostBackValue%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPoint.Label%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPoint.LegendText%2A>，<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPoint.LegendToolTip%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPoint.CustomProperties%2A>，這是自訂屬性的名稱。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPoint.CustomProperties%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPoint.LegendToolTip%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPoint.LegendText%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPoint.Label%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPoint.PostBackValue%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPoint.Url%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPoint.ToolTip%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPoint.AxisLabel%2A>

trans-unit.source: The data source from which the chart is bound.
trans-unit.target: 從中圖表會繫結資料來源。

trans-unit.source: The name of the field used to group data into the series.
trans-unit.target: 用來將資料分組成數列的欄位名稱。

trans-unit.source: The name of the field for X values.
trans-unit.target: X 值欄位的名稱。

trans-unit.source: A comma-separated list of name(s) of the field(s) for Y value(s).
trans-unit.target: 以逗號分隔清單的欄位名稱的 Y 值。

trans-unit.source: The other data point properties that can be bound.
trans-unit.target: 其他資料點可以繫結的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Data binds a chart to the table, with one series created per unique value in a given column.
trans-unit.target: 資料繫結到資料表中，建立每個唯一值，指定資料行中的一個數列的圖表。

trans-unit.source: Series will be automatically added to the chart, depending on the number of unique values in the given `seriesGroupByField` column of the data source; in other words, the creation of series depends upon grouping of a column.
trans-unit.target: 數列將會自動加入至圖表，根據中唯一值數目指定`seriesGroupByField`資料行的資料來源; 亦即，數列建立相依於資料行群組。

trans-unit.source: The data source can be a <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataReader>, <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataReader> or a <xref:System.Data.DataView> object.
trans-unit.target: 資料來源可以是<xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataReader>，<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataReader>或<xref:System.Data.DataView>物件。</xref:System.Data.DataView> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataReader> </xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataReader>

trans-unit.source: Note that all collections that implement the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> interface can be used.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，所有集合，都實作<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>介面可用。</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>

trans-unit.source: Other data point properties besides X and Y-values can be bound.
trans-unit.target: 其他資料點屬性除了可以繫結的 X 和 Y 值。

trans-unit.source: The format is: PointProperty=Field[{Format}] [,PointProperty= Field[{Format}]].
trans-unit.target: 格式為︰ PointProperty = 欄位 {} [格式] [，PointProperty = 欄位 [{格式}]]。

trans-unit.source: For example:"Tooltip=Price{C1},Href=WebSiteName".
trans-unit.target: 例如: 「 工具提示 = 價格 {C1}，Href = WebSiteName"。

trans-unit.source: A list of these data point properties is as follows: <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPointCustomProperties.AxisLabel%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPointCustomProperties.ToolTip%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPointCustomProperties.Url%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPointCustomProperties.Label%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPointCustomProperties.LegendText%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPointCustomProperties.LegendToolTip%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPointCustomProperties.CustomProperties%2A>, which are the names of the custom properties.
trans-unit.target: 這些資料點的屬性清單如下所示︰ <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPointCustomProperties.AxisLabel%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPointCustomProperties.ToolTip%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPointCustomProperties.Url%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPointCustomProperties.Label%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPointCustomProperties.LegendText%2A>，<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPointCustomProperties.LegendToolTip%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPointCustomProperties.CustomProperties%2A>，這是自訂屬性的名稱。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPointCustomProperties.CustomProperties%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPointCustomProperties.LegendToolTip%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPointCustomProperties.LegendText%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPointCustomProperties.Label%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPointCustomProperties.Url%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPointCustomProperties.ToolTip%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPointCustomProperties.AxisLabel%2A>

trans-unit.source: The data source from which the chart is bound.
trans-unit.target: 從中圖表會繫結資料來源。

trans-unit.source: The name of the field used to group data into the series.
trans-unit.target: 用來將資料分組成數列的欄位名稱。

trans-unit.source: The name of the field for X values.
trans-unit.target: X 值欄位的名稱。

trans-unit.source: A comma-separated list of name(s) of the field(s) for Y value(s).
trans-unit.target: 以逗號分隔清單的欄位名稱的 Y 值。

trans-unit.source: The other data point properties that can be bound.
trans-unit.target: 其他資料點可以繫結的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Series will be sorted by group field values in the specified order.
trans-unit.target: 序列會依群組欄位值，指定的順序排序。

trans-unit.source: Automatically creates and binds series data to the specified data table.
trans-unit.target: 自動建立，並將數列資料繫結至指定的資料表。

trans-unit.source: Each column of the table becomes a Y-value for a series, with one series per column.
trans-unit.target: 資料表的每個資料行會成為數列，而每個資料行的一個數列的 Y 值。

trans-unit.source: The data source, which can be any <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> object.
trans-unit.target: 資料來源可以是任何<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>物件。</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>

trans-unit.source: Automatically creates and binds series data to the specified data table, and optionally populates X-values.
trans-unit.target: 會自動建立數列資料繫結至指定的資料表，並選擇性地填入 X 值。

trans-unit.source: Each column of the table becomes a Y-value for a series, with one series per column.
trans-unit.target: 資料表的每個資料行會成為數列，而每個資料行的一個數列的 Y 值。

trans-unit.source: The series' X-value field can also be provided.
trans-unit.target: 也可以提供數列的 X 值欄位。

trans-unit.source: The data source, which can be any <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> object.
trans-unit.target: 資料來源可以是任何<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>物件。</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>

trans-unit.source: The name of the field used for the series X-values.
trans-unit.target: 用於數列 X 值欄位的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataManipulator"></xref> object, which provides methods and properties that handle data.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataManipulator"></xref>物件，提供方法和處理資料的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Use this property at run-time to: - Copy Y-values.
trans-unit.target: 在執行階段来使用這個屬性:-複製的 Y 值。

trans-unit.source: - Filter data.
trans-unit.target: -篩選資料。

trans-unit.source: - Group data.
trans-unit.target: 為群組的資料。

trans-unit.source: - Replace missing data with empty points.
trans-unit.target: -將遺漏的資料取代空點。

trans-unit.source: - Export data to a <xref:System.Data.DataSet> object.
trans-unit.target: 匯出資料至<xref:System.Data.DataSet>物件。</xref:System.Data.DataSet>

trans-unit.source: - Sort data.
trans-unit.target: 排序資料。

trans-unit.source: - Apply a financial formula to data.
trans-unit.target: -套用至資料的財務公式。

trans-unit.source: Refer to the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataManipulator> class overview for further details.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataManipulator>類別概觀，以取得詳細資料。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataManipulator>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataManipulator"></xref> object which provides methods and properties that handle data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataManipulator"> </xref>物件可提供方法和處理資料的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the data source for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定資料來源<xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: The data points in a series can be bound to a data source at any time using the DataSource property.
trans-unit.target: 一系列中的資料點可以隨時使用 DataSource 屬性繫結至資料來源之用。

trans-unit.source: To force the chart to bind to the data source, call the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.DataBind%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要強制圖表，即可將繫結至資料來源，請呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.DataBind%2A>方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.DataBind%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following is a list of objects that you can use as the data source: - DataView - Data readers (SQL, OleDB) - DataSet - DataTable - Binding Source - IDataSource - Arrays - Lists - All Enumerable objects - SqlCommand / OleDbCommand (DataSource data-binding only) - SqlDataAdapter / OleDbDataAdapter (DataSource data-binding only)
trans-unit.target: 以下是您可以使用做為資料來源的物件清單︰ DataView-資料讀取器 （SQL、 OleDB）--資料表的資料集繫結來源的 IDataSource-陣列-清單-所有可列舉的物件-SqlCommand / OleDbCommand （DataSource 資料繫結只）-Add / OleDbDataAdapter （DataSource 資料繫結只）

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that represents the data source for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object>表示的資料來源<xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart"></xref>物件。</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the location of a detailed description of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定的詳細描述的位置<xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> value that represents the URL of a detailed description of the chart.
trans-unit.target: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""> </xref>值，表示圖表的詳細描述的 URL。

trans-unit.source: Disposes of the object, using the <xref:System.IDisposable> interface.
trans-unit.target: 處置物件，使用<xref:System.IDisposable>介面。</xref:System.IDisposable>

trans-unit.source: Releases unmanaged and, optionally, managed resources.
trans-unit.target: 釋放 unmanaged 資源並，或者，managed 資源。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both unmanaged and managed resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>表示釋放 managed 和 unmanaged 資源，<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>表示只釋放 unmanaged 的資源。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a flag that determines whether state management is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定旗標來判斷是否已啟用狀態管理。

trans-unit.source: Set this property to `true` to enable state management for the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> control.
trans-unit.target: 將此屬性設定為`true`啟用的狀態管理<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>

trans-unit.source: The view state that is saved is determined by either the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.ViewStateContent%2A> or <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.ViewStateData%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 儲存檢視狀態由 <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.ViewStateContent%2A>或<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.ViewStateData%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.ViewStateData%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.ViewStateContent%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This property must be set prior to the Page_Load (the Page_Init or the constructor will work) or it will have no effect.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > （Page_Init 或建構函式都可以） Page_Load 之前，必須設定這個屬性，或沒有任何作用。

trans-unit.source: For more information consult the Visual Studio documentation that discusses view state or state management.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊請參閱 Visual Studio 文件的討論檢視狀態或狀態管理。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if state management is enabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果已啟用狀態管理。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the font properties of the control.
trans-unit.target: 取得控制項的字型屬性。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo"></xref> object that represents the font properties of the control.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo"> </xref>物件，代表控制項的字型屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text color of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定文字色彩<xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: This property is not applicable to this class.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性不適用於這個類別。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value that represents the text color of the chart.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref>值，表示圖表的文字色彩。

trans-unit.source: Called when a numeric value has to be converted to a string.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫時的數值轉換成字串。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Returns the chart element outline.
trans-unit.target: 傳回圖表項目外框。

trans-unit.source: If the `chartElement` is not part of the chart, or the `elementType` cannot be combined with `chartElement`, the result will contain an empty array of marker points.
trans-unit.target: 如果`chartElement`不是圖表的一部分或`elementType`無法結合`chartElement`，結果將包含標記點的空陣列。

trans-unit.source: The marker points are sorted clockwise.
trans-unit.target: 標記點會朝順時針方向排序。

trans-unit.source: The chart element.
trans-unit.target: 圖表元素。

trans-unit.source: The type of element.
trans-unit.target: 項目的型別。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartElementOutline"></xref> object that contains: - An array of points in absolute coordinates that can be used as outline markers around this chart element.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartElementOutline"> </xref>物件，其中包含:-的絕對座標可做為此圖表元素周圍的外框標記中的點陣列。

trans-unit.source: - A <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath"></xref> object for drawing an outline around this chart element.
trans-unit.target: -A <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath"> </xref>繪製外的框此圖表元素的物件。

trans-unit.source: Returns the HTML image map of the currently rendered chart.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 HTML 的目前呈現的圖表影像對應。

trans-unit.source: One of the overloaded `SaveImage` methods in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart"></xref> must be called before calling this method.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個多載`SaveImage`方法<xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart"></xref>必須呼叫這個方法之前呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The name of the image map tag.
trans-unit.target: 影像地圖標記的名稱。

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> value that represents the HTML image map.
trans-unit.target: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""> </xref>值，表示 HTML 影像對應。

trans-unit.source: Returns the requested chart service.
trans-unit.target: 傳回所要求的圖表服務。

trans-unit.source: The type of requested chart service.
trans-unit.target: 服務要求的圖表類型。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that represents the service type or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the service cannot be found.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object>表示服務型別或<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>如果找不到服務。</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the height of the entire chart image in pixels.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定整個圖表影像的高度，單位為像素。

trans-unit.source: Do not specify the value in percentage (%) or point (pt).
trans-unit.target: 百分比 （%） 或點 (pt) 中未指定值。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 否則，會擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit"></xref> value that represents the height, in pixels, of the entire chart image.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit"> </xref>代表高度，單位為像素整個圖表影像的值。

trans-unit.source: Determines the chart element, if any, that is located at a point defined by the given X and Y coordinates.
trans-unit.target: 決定的圖表項目，如果任何，位於點上所定義的指定的 X 和 Y 座標。

trans-unit.source: Call this method to determine the chart element, if any, which is located at a specified point.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫這個方法，以決定圖表元素，如果有的話，位於指定點。

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > In order for this method to work correctly, the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.IsMapEnabled%2A> property must be set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT] >，此方法才能正確運作，順序<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.IsMapEnabled%2A>屬性必須設定為`false`。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.IsMapEnabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method can be used with the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.Click> server-side event when you implement drilldown.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法可以用於<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.Click>伺服器端事件時實作向下鑽研。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.Click>

trans-unit.source: However, it is highly recommended that you use client-side image maps for drilldown because of ease of use.
trans-unit.target: 不過，強烈建議向下鑽研使用用戶端影像對應，因為易於使用。

trans-unit.source: The properties of the returned <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.HitTestResult> object can then be used to determine which chart element was clicked; the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.HitTestResult> object also provides an instance of the actual object selected, if any.
trans-unit.target: 傳回之屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.HitTestResult>物件然後可以用來判斷已按下哪個圖表項目;<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.HitTestResult>物件也提供選取，實際物件的執行個體，如果有的話。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.HitTestResult> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.HitTestResult>

trans-unit.source: The X-coordinate value of the point the user clicked.
trans-unit.target: 使用者按一下之點的 X 座標值。

trans-unit.source: The Y-coordinate value of the point the user clicked.
trans-unit.target: 使用者按一下之點的 Y 座標值。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.HitTestResult"></xref> object, which provides information concerning the chart element, if any, that is at the specified location.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.HitTestResult"> </xref>物件，提供有關圖表元素，如果有的話，這是在指定的位置。

trans-unit.source: Determines the chart element, if any, that is located at a point defined by given X and Y coordinates.
trans-unit.target: 決定圖表元素，如果有的話，位於所定義的點上指定 X 和 Y 座標。

trans-unit.source: Transparent elements can optionally be ignored.
trans-unit.target: 可以選擇性地忽略透明項目。

trans-unit.source: Call this method to determine the chart element, if any, which is located at a specified point.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫這個方法，以決定圖表元素，如果有的話，位於指定點。

trans-unit.source: To ignore transparent elements, set the `ignoreTransparent` parameter to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要忽略透明項目，設定`ignoreTransparent`參數`true`。

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > In order for this method to work correctly, the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.IsMapEnabled%2A> property must be set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT] >，此方法才能正確運作，順序<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.IsMapEnabled%2A>屬性必須設定為`false`。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.IsMapEnabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method can be used with the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.Click> server-side event when you implement drilldown.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法可以用於<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.Click>伺服器端事件時實作向下鑽研。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.Click>

trans-unit.source: However, it is highly recommended that you use client-side image maps for drilldown because of ease of use.
trans-unit.target: 不過，強烈建議向下鑽研使用用戶端影像對應，因為易於使用。

trans-unit.source: The properties of the returned <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.HitTestResult> object can then be used to determine which chart element was clicked; the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.HitTestResult> object also provides an instance of the actual object selected, if any.
trans-unit.target: 傳回之屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.HitTestResult>物件然後可以用來判斷已按下哪個圖表項目;<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.HitTestResult>物件也提供選取，實際物件的執行個體，如果有的話。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.HitTestResult> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.HitTestResult>

trans-unit.source: The X-coordinate value of the point the user clicked on.
trans-unit.target: 點的 X 座標值，使用者按一下。

trans-unit.source: The Y-coordinate value of the point the user clicked on.
trans-unit.target: 點的 Y 座標值，使用者按一下。

trans-unit.source: A flag that determines if transparent elements are ignored.
trans-unit.target: 此旗標決定透明的元素會被忽略。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.HitTestResult"></xref> object, which provides information concerning the chart element, if any, that is at the specified location.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.HitTestResult"> </xref>物件，提供有關圖表元素，如果有的話，這是在指定的位置。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether a chart element of a given type is located at a point defined by the given X and Y coordinates.
trans-unit.target: 判斷是否為指定類型的圖表元素位於點定義所指定的 X 和 Y 座標。

trans-unit.source: Call this method to determine if a chart element of the given type is located at a specified point.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫此方法以判斷指定之類型的圖表項目是否位於指定點。

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > In order for this method to work correctly, the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.IsMapEnabled%2A> property must be set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT] >，此方法才能正確運作，順序<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.IsMapEnabled%2A>屬性必須設定為`false`。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.IsMapEnabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method can be used with the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.Click> server-side event when you implement drilldown.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法可以用於<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.Click>伺服器端事件時實作向下鑽研。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.Click>

trans-unit.source: However, it is highly recommended that you use client-side image maps for drilldown because of ease of use.
trans-unit.target: 不過，強烈建議向下鑽研使用用戶端影像對應，因為易於使用。

trans-unit.source: The properties of the returned <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.HitTestResult> object can then be used to determine which chart element was clicked; the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.HitTestResult> object also provides an instance of the actual object selected, if any.
trans-unit.target: 傳回之屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.HitTestResult>物件然後可以用來判斷已按下哪個圖表項目;<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.HitTestResult>物件也提供選取，實際物件的執行個體，如果有的話。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.HitTestResult> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.HitTestResult>

trans-unit.source: The X-coordinate value of the point the user clicked on.
trans-unit.target: 點的 X 座標值，使用者按一下。

trans-unit.source: The Y-coordinate value of the point the user clicked on.
trans-unit.target: 點的 Y 座標值，使用者按一下。

trans-unit.source: A flag that determines the chart element type to be tested.
trans-unit.target: 判斷要測試的圖表項目類型的旗標。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.HitTestResult"></xref> object that provides information about the chart element, if any, found at the specified location.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.HitTestResult"> </xref>物件，如果在指定的位置找到的任何項目，提供圖表項目相關的資訊。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether a chart element that is one of the specified types is located at a point defined by the given X and Y coordinates.
trans-unit.target: 判斷是否為其中一個指定類型的圖表元素位於點定義所指定的 X 和 Y 座標。

trans-unit.source: Call this method to determine the gauge element, if any, which is located at a specified point.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫這個方法來判斷的量測計項目，如果有的話，位於指定點。

trans-unit.source: This method is often used in some mouse-related event, for example, MouseDown, to determine which gauge element the end-user clicked.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法通常用於某些滑鼠相關的事件，例如 MouseDown 判斷的量測計，使用者按下的項目。

trans-unit.source: The X and Y mouse coordinates obtained from the event parameters are then used for the X and Y parameter values of this method call.
trans-unit.target: 從事件參數取得 X 和 Y 滑鼠座標則可用於這個方法呼叫的 X 和 Y 參數值。

trans-unit.source: The properties of the returned <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.HitTestResult> object can then be used to determine which chart element was clicked; the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.HitTestResult> object also provides an instance of the actual object selected, if any.
trans-unit.target: 傳回之屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.HitTestResult>物件然後可以用來判斷已按下哪個圖表項目;<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.HitTestResult>物件也提供選取，實際物件的執行個體，如果有的話。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.HitTestResult> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.HitTestResult>

trans-unit.source: The X-coordinate for the specified data point.
trans-unit.target: 指定的資料點的 X 座標。

trans-unit.source: The Y-coordinate for the specified data point.
trans-unit.target: 指定的資料點的 Y 座標。

trans-unit.source: A flag that indicates that transparent elements should be ignored.
trans-unit.target: 旗標，指出不應忽略透明項目。

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartElementType"></xref> objects that specify the types to test for, in order to filter the result.
trans-unit.target: 陣列<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartElementType"></xref>物件，指定要測試，以篩選結果的類型。

trans-unit.source: If omitted, checking for element types will be ignored and all element types will be valid.
trans-unit.target: 如果省略，檢查項目型別會被忽略，且所有項目類型有效。

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.HitTestResult"></xref> objects that provides information about the chart element, if any, found at the specified location.
trans-unit.target: 陣列<xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.HitTestResult"></xref>提供的圖表項目的相關資訊，如果您在指定的位置，找到的物件。

trans-unit.source: The array contains at least one element, which can be <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartElementType"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 此陣列包含至少一個項目，可以是<xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartElementType"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The objects in the result are sorted from the top to the bottom of different layers of control.
trans-unit.target: 在結果物件的排序是由頂端到底部的控制項之不同層。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the location where an image file is saved when <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.RenderType"></xref> rendering is performed.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定影像檔儲存的位置時<xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.RenderType"></xref>轉譯會執行。

trans-unit.source: This property has no effect if <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.ImageStorageMode%2A> is set to <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.ImageStorageMode.UseHttpHandler%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個屬性就不會影響<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.ImageStorageMode%2A>設定為<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.ImageStorageMode.UseHttpHandler%2A>.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.ImageStorageMode.UseHttpHandler%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.ImageStorageMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you render a chart image using the image tag method, a chart image is generated and then saved to disk at the server, in a format that is determined by the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageType> property.
trans-unit.target: 當您轉譯圖表影像，以使用影像標記的方法時，產生並儲存至磁碟，在伺服器上，由所決定的格式圖表影像<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageType>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageType>

trans-unit.source: The URL where the image file is saved can be either absolute or relative; the file extension that the image file has is determined by the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageType> property.
trans-unit.target: 映像檔案的儲存位置的 URL 可以是絕對或相對的;映像檔案的副檔名由<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageType>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageType>

trans-unit.source: The image file can be hard-coded to always be one filename, or you can use the "#" sign to use either user identifiers (UIDs) or a specified number of uniquely named files, which is known as a Round Robin.
trans-unit.target: 這個映像檔案可能是硬式編碼為永遠在一個檔名，或您可以使用"#"符號來使用使用者識別碼 (Uid) 或指定的數目的唯一命名的檔案，也就是循環配置資源。

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> value that represents the URL where the image file is saved on the server.
trans-unit.target: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""> </xref>值，表示伺服器儲存映像檔案的 URL。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.NamedImagesCollection"></xref> object, which stores <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.NamedImage"></xref> objects for the chart.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.NamedImagesCollection"></xref>物件，其中儲存<xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.NamedImage"></xref>圖表物件。

trans-unit.source: Use this property to add <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.NamedImage> objects to and remove <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.NamedImage> objects from the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.NamedImagesCollection> object of the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個屬性來加入<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.NamedImage>物件到並移除<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.NamedImage>從<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.NamedImagesCollection><xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>物件</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.NamedImagesCollection>的物件</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.NamedImage></xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.NamedImage>
